Old Mother Hubbard.translation[0].defini: a character in a nursery rhyme (=an old song or poem for young children): Old Mother Hubbard went to the cupboard, to get her poor dog a bone; but when she came there the cupboard was bare, and so the poor dog had none.  The expression ‘the cupboard is bare’ is sometimes used about a situation in which a person, organization, or government has no money left.
